title: DERIVED FROM: MAVEN SWEA (Solar Wind Electron Analyzer) Survey Pitch Angle Distribution  - David L. Mitchell (mitchell@ssl.berkeley.edu) (UCB/SSL)

info.x_cadence_note: Counts based on variable 'epoch' in https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/sp_phys/data/maven/swea/l2/svypad/2014/10/mvn_swe_l2_svypad_20141010_v04_r01.cdf. The most common cadence, 3999972096 [ns] = PT3.999972S, occurred for 24.0836% of the 5197 timesteps.

parameters.name: Time
parameters.x_description: Time, center of sample, in TT2000 time base

parameters.name: counts
parameters.description: Raw instrument counts (energy vs pitch angle index)

parameters.name: counts_movie
parameters.description: ---> Counts (movie: energy vs pitch angle index). This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function alternate_view (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['counts']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: diff_en_fluxes
parameters.description: Calibrated differential energy flux (energy vs pitch angles for 158eV)

parameters.name: variance
parameters.description: Variance of differential energy flux (unavailable before 2014/11/15)

parameters.name: diff_en_fluxes_movie
parameters.description: ---> Flux (movie: energy vs  pitch angles for 158eV). This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function alternate_view (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['diff_en_fluxes']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: pa_E31
parameters.description: Median pitch angles (values at 158 eV). This variable is a 'virtual' variable that is computed using the function arr_slice (see https://cdaweb.gsfc.nasa.gov/pub/software/cdawlib/source/virtual_funcs.pro) on the with inputs of the variables ['pa']. Note that some COMPONENTS may not be available from the HAPI interface. They are accessible from the raw CDF files, however.

parameters.name: b_azim
parameters.description: Magnetic field azimuth in instrument coordiantes

parameters.name: b_elev
parameters.description: Magnetic field elevation in instrument coordiantes

parameters.name: binning
parameters.description: Energy binning factor: 1 = 64 energies, 2 = 32 energies, 4 = 16 energies
